attributes.action: Halt EU Propaganda to British School Children
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Secretary of State for Education to halt the promulgation to school children of European Union propaganda in favour of EU Membership. This is being deployed on a continuing basis in video and written form designed to influence school children in favour of EU membership. As such this programme appears to breach the law banning promotion of “partisan political views” in schools and requires a balanced presentation of issues.
